original: 5s
zh_trans: 5秒

original: Thorin: The path is clear, fall back now!!!!
zh_trans: 索林: 障碍已清楚，快撤退！！

original: Thorin: WE LOST THE PATH!!! WHERE IS THE PATH!!!!
zh_trans: 索林：我们迷失了方向！路在哪？！！

original: Thorin: Stay in the light, try to find the path again, dont get lost!!!!!
zh_trans: 索林：呆在明亮的地方，试着再次找到道路。别迷路了！

original: Thorin: Watch out for those plants off the path Gandolf warned us about!!!
zh_trans: 索林：小心那些甘道夫警告过我们的植物！！

original: WE FOUND IT!!! WE FOUND THE PATH!!! We are clearing the entrance now, fall back to us NOW!!!!
zh_trans: 我们找到了！我们找到路了！我们正在清理入口中，和我们一起撤退！！

original: Throin: It is open, the path is clear!!! Run!!!!
zh_trans: 索林：障碍已经清除！撤退！

original: Thorin: The path is overgrown again, break it down!!!!!
zh_trans: 索林：这里的过度生长的杂草阻碍了我们的去路，清理掉它们！

original: Thorin: Be sure to watch our backs, the orcs are on our trail!!!!
zh_trans: 索林：一定要注意我们的背后，兽人在追踪我们！

original: **Level1**
zh_trans: **第一关**

original: A LOTR Map By hotEvercLear
zh_trans: 魔戒地图 制作 hotEvercLear

original: Gandalf: This is the forest of Mirkwood.... Be sure to stick to the path...
zh_trans: 甘道夫：这里是幽暗密林……一定要沿着道路走

original: Gandalf: There are plants that grow off the path that will kill you!!!!.
zh_trans: 甘道夫：小心路旁的一些植物，那玩意能要了我们的命

original: Gandalf: Orcs are coming... RUN!!!!!
zh_trans: 甘道夫：半兽人来了！快跑！

original: Thorin: The Path Is Overgrown... We must break our way through before it is too late
zh_trans: 索林：道路被杂草挡住了。我们必须清掉那些杂草！

original: Thorin: Something Has Knocked Over These Trees, Quickly Now, Climb Over Them!
zh_trans: 索林：有些东西撞倒了这些树，快点，爬过他们！

original: Thorin: Curse this forest... the path is overgrown again.. quckly, break it down before the Orcs return...
zh_trans: 索林：该死的森林……小路上又长满了杂草。快点，在半兽人来之前清掉它们

original: Throin: Get accross the bridge and defend you fools!!!! The Orcs are behind us!!!!
zh_trans: 索林：你们这些傻瓜！过桥守住！半兽人就在你们后面！

original: Thorin: Hold the Bridge, the path ahead is blocked... it will take a moment to clear it...
zh_trans: 索林：守住这座桥！前方的道路被挡住了，需要一点时间来清理道路……

original: Thorn: Hold The Bridge while Bilbo is clearing the path
zh_trans: 索林：守住这座桥！比尔博已经在清理路障了！

original: Thorin: I can see a bridge, defend here while we clear the path!!!
zh_trans: 索林：我看到桥了，守住这里直到我们清完路障！

original: Thorin: Fall Back!!!! Get Accross The Bridge!!!!
zh_trans: 索林：撤退！过桥！

original: Thorin: The sides of the bridges are cracking, dont step on them, they can break!!!!
zh_trans: 索林：桥的侧面开裂了，不要踩在那上面，他们可能会破裂！

original: Thorin: The path is blocked, defend here until Bilbo has it clear
zh_trans: 索林：被路障挡住了，守住！直到比尔博清除掉路障

original: Thorin: Watch out!!!! The path is covered by those deadly plants, stay on the rocks and logs!!!!
zh_trans: 索林：小心！！这条路被致命的植物覆盖，在石头和树干上面走！

original: Thorin The Orcs have vallen back... RUN!!!!
zh_trans: 索林：半兽人回来了……快跑！

original: Thorin: It is clear, fall back now!!!!
zh_trans: 索林：路障已经清楚，快撤退！

original: Thorin: This is our respite, hold them off until the light comes, Sons of Durin!!!!!
zh_trans: 索林：这是我们的喘息之机，坚持至光明降临。都灵之子！！

original: **Level2**
zh_trans: **第二关**

original: Thorin: Hold Here while we clear the path
zh_trans: 索林：守住这里，直到我们清除完路障

original: Thorin: There are no shortcuts in Mirkwood, stick to the path!!!
zh_trans: 索林：幽暗密林里没有捷径，沿着小路走！

original: Thorin: The rocks are blocking the path, break through!!!
zh_trans: 索林：这些石头挡住了去路，打破它们！

original: Thorin: The path ahead is blocked, defend the rocks until it is cleared
zh_trans: 索林：前面的道路被阻挡了，守住这些石头直到路障被清除

original: Thorin: What are these webs?!?!?
zh_trans: 索林：这些网是什么？！

original: Thorin: Defend Here while we clear the path
zh_trans: 索林：守住这里直到我们清除完路障

original: Thorin: What is this place, I see nests and webs everywhere!!!!
zh_trans: 索林：这是什么地方？怎么到处都是蜘蛛网和巢穴？！

original: Thorin: The Spiders are gone, fall back now!!!!!
zh_trans: 索林：这些蜘蛛已经走了，快撤退！

original: Thorin: Watchout for the plants!!! quickly now, the Orcs will be upon us soon!
zh_trans: 索林：小心这些植物！快点，兽人快来了！

original: Thorin: Look, an Elvish healing pool!!!! heal before the Orcs come
zh_trans: 索林：看！精灵的泉水！在兽人到来之前治疗一下

original: Thorin: Cover and defend for Bombar, he is fat and slow!!!
zh_trans: 索林：保护庞伯！他非常的慢！！

original: Thorin: The path is blocked ahead, quickly, clear it!!!
zh_trans: 索林：前面的路被堵住了！快点清掉！

original: Thorin: The path ahead is blocked, defend here
zh_trans: 索林：前面的路被堵住了，守住这里！

original: Thorin: Looks like a rockslide is blockingthe path, break through!!!!
zh_trans: 索林：山体滑坡挡住了我们的去路！快点清理掉！

original: Thorin: The path ahead is blocked, defend here while we clear it
zh_trans: 索林：前面的路被堵住了，守住这里，我们正在清理道路

original: Thorin: Fall back!!! They orcs are coming!!!!
zh_trans: 索林: 撤退 兽人来了!!!!

original: Thorin: What is this place? This looks like the main spider nest!!!
zh_trans: 索林：这是什么地方？这里好像是蜘蛛的主巢！！！

original: Thorin: Spread out and keep your eyes open
zh_trans: 索林：分散！保持警惕

original: Thorin: Run, the orcs are comming!!!!
zh_trans: 索林：快跑，兽人来了!!!!

original: Thorin: There are Orc archers ahead, watch out for their arrrows!!!!
zh_trans: 索林：前方有兽人弓箭手，小心他们的箭矢!!!!
